title: My acount got deleted but when i log i find it in a different region
body: So my acount was on the Eu Nordic since i started the game i reached level 30 and i have alot of skins. Earlier today i went to log in my acount i found myself in different region with the same acount what more me more sure this a (bug/tech problem) i found the same items set that i have for my acount  Eu Nordic and my ingame name was one of the EU nordic aswell and i never bought a region change so i dont this a bug or technical problem from riot i already made a ticket and i have been waiting for over 24 hours now so i come and ask any admin or support here and thanks :)

replies.body: I went ahead and checked into this account for you while you wait for a reply from those account agents, but it looks like this one is only level 2 and has only ever been in the NA region. If you're talking about a different account go ahead and shoot me that Summoner Name and I'll get into it for you as well!
NourTheLord On Eu Nordic region And I am also ready to tell u about any information about my account in case I got hacked and u want proof I am the owner

I've got that account pulled up now, and it's still sitting safely on EUN where it was created. Double check that you have the correct region selected on the client, and if so take a screenshot for me showing where it won't let you sign in.
I send u the screen shot here or on a link ?
You can use something like Gyazo or Imgur to capture that screenshot and paste the url here.
Yea everything looks good there. Straaaaaaaange.....reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so they can look into this for you.
For how long I have to wait for the support I did the ticket before I even wright this post
I already left. A ticket before I talk to u I have been waiting for like 2-3 days for someone to open my ticket
